children.text: POSTGRADUATE RESEARCH COLLEGEThe Postgraduate Research College works in partnership with academic schools and Professional Services colleagues to enhance your postgraduate experience.

RESEARCH INSTITUTES AND CENTRESMultidisciplinary research centres and institutes bring together experts at the cutting edge of their fields to work with colleagues across the UK and beyond on the big issues of today.
